feed.title: Eva Lugo's IIT Labs
feed.subtitle: A feed of my recent Interactive Information Technology labs at RPI.

entry.title: Lab 4: XML RSS and Atom Feed Creation
entry.summary: Created RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 feeds to syndicate my IIT lab work. This lab involved understanding XML schemas, feed structures, and styling XML with CSS.

entry.title: Lab 3: Developing a Personal Website
entry.summary: Createed a personal website within the "iit" subdirectory of the Azure instance, using a lab03 branch. The site requires multiple pages (home, projects/labs, and individual lab landing pages) with a consistent design and a separate CSS file.

entry.title: Lab 2: Developing a Resume in HTML
entry.summary: Developed a resume using HTML and CSS. The website showcases my resume in a website form.

entry.title: Lab 1: Introduction to Web Technologies/Setting Up
entry.summary: An introductory lab covering the basics of web technologies, and HTTP. Set up a basic web server and deployed a simple HTML page, also did all the background administrative tasks.
